summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/12/26 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Edgar Wright'], 'Producers': ['Nira Park'], 'Starring': ['Simon Pegg', 'Nick Frost', 'Paddy Considine'], 'Studio': ['NBC Universal']} Review Text: A deep exploration of human connectedness and brotherly love in the face of cruel time. Add pubs, car chases, explosions, 1000 funny jokes, and you'll have the thread of this film. Pegg and Frost are on par with the great comedy teams of all time. Review Title: A Riot Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/01/18 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Greg Mottola'], 'Producers': ['Tim Bevan', 'Nira Park', 'Eric Fellner'], 'Starring': ['Simon Pegg', 'Nick Frost', 'Seth Rogen'], 'Studio': ['UNIVERSAL PAY TELEVISION']} Review Text: I really enjoy these two as a comedy team. The film is very funny and has a lot of social commentary on the US. Review Title: Great Movie for a laugh Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/09/01 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Lana Wachowski', 'Tom Tykwer', 'Lilly Wachowski'], 'Producers': ['Stefan Arndt', 'Alex Boden', 'David Brown', 'John Chong', 'José Luis Escolar', 'Peter Grossman', 'Grant Hill'], 'Starring': ['Tom Hanks', 'Halle Berry', 'Jim Broadbent'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} Review Text: Gadzooks it made my head hurt trying to rationalize why I was spending time watching it. I loved the Matrix. This was nothing like it. I wanted it to be deep and profound...Nope. Review Title: Pompous Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/04/09 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Colin Bucksey', 'Neil Burger', 'Adam Bernstein', 'John Dahl', 'Matthew McLoota', 'Anna Boden', 'Ryan Fleck', 'Daniel Attias', 'Karyn Kusama', 'James Foley'], 'Studio': ['Showtime Networks Inc.']} Review Text: A great cast. A great script. A great production. The writers show a very good understanding of the industry and its culture. Review Title: Wow Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: John Wick 3 - Parabellum Review Date: 2021/04/16 Categories: Suspense, Action, Compelling, Thrilling Product Description: ['Keanu Reeves is back as the legendary hit man John Wick in this sequel that finds him fighting for his life on the streets of NYC.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Chad Stahelski'], 'Producers': ['Basil Iwanyk', 'Erica Lee'], 'Starring': ['Keanu Reeves', 'Halle Berry', 'Laurence Fishburne']} Review Text: Non stop action. Very good depiction of expert shooting skill. Review Title: Thrilling Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Seven Days in May (1964) Review Date: 2021/04/16 Store: John Frankenheimer (Director), Burt Lancaster (Actor), Kirk Douglas (Actor) & 0 more Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles Product Description: ["It happens with startling swiftness and violence. An armed cadre seizes state control. Fortunately, a coup d'etat can't happen here. Or can it? A classic of suspense directed by John Frankenheimer (The Manchurian Candidate, Ronin) and written for the screen by Rod Serling (The Twilight Zone), Seven Days in May tautly explores that possibility. At odds are a popular general and Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman (Burt Lancaster) and an unpopular president (Fredric March) with a pacifist agenda. At stake is the survival of the Republic. A vigilant colonel (Kirk Douglas) uncovers the scheme. But are the seven fateful days ahead enough time to derail a takeover? The clock is ticking."] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': "Edmond O'Brien, John Frankenheimer, Hugh Marlowe, Kirk Douglas, Fredric March, Whit Bissell, George Macready, Martin Balsam, Burt Lancaster, Ava GardnerEdmond O'Brien, John Frankenheimer, Hugh Marlowe, Kirk Douglas, Fredric March, Whit Bissell, George Macready, Martin Balsam, Burt Lancaster, Ava Gardner See more", 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 58 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'John Frankenheimer', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 58 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 22, 2016', 'Actors': "Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas, Fredric March, Ava Gardner, Edmond O'Brien", 'Studio': 'Warner Archive Collection', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Excellent movie. Explores the balance of power between the military and the civilian authority and the duty that each owes to the country. Powerful acting. Thoughtful script. Review Title: Place your bets Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/03/27 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Gary Ross'], 'Producers': ['Scott Stuber', 'Gary Ross', 'Jon Kilik'], 'Starring': ['Matthew McConaughey', 'Gugu Mbatha-Raw', 'Mahershala Ali'], 'Studio': ['STXfilms']} Review Text: Very good script and well acted. Lays out a sweep of history covering slavery to the civil rights era. Very good movie that explains where we are at today. I would highly recco it to young adults. Review Title: Well done Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/03/27 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Wise'], 'Producers': ['Charles H. Maguire', 'Robert Wise'], 'Starring': ['Steve McQueen', 'Richard Attenborough', 'Richard Crenna'], 'Studio': ['20th Century Fox']} Review Text: Very well made film with fantastic script, production, and acting. Very deep messages about the nature of human relationships, love, and war in multiple levels from the space between two people and between two peoples.
I go back to this film every so often to reflect on its meaning. As the West is trying to cope with a China on the rise its message is very relevant today.
The high production value created a flawless view into another time and world. Review Title: You must see this Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/11/05 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Mick Jackson'], 'Producers': ['Scott Ferguson', 'Emily Gerson Saines', 'Gil Bellows', 'Alison Owen', 'Paul Lister', 'Anthony Edwards', 'Dante Di Loreto'], 'Starring': ['Claire Danes', "Catherine O'Hara", 'Julia Ormond'], 'Studio': ['HBO']} Review Text: Claire Danes is a fantastic actress. Review Title: Great story Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/11/05 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Clint Eastwood'], 'Producers': ['Clint Eastwood', 'Albert S. Ruddy', 'Tim Moore', 'Jessica Meier', 'David M. Bernstein'], 'Starring': ['Clint Eastwood', 'Eduardo Minett', 'Natalia Traven']} Review Text: This movie and The Mule show how refined skill can make a classic film on a low budget. The acting and story in this film are well worth it. Review Title: Clint Eastwood shows how Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has a strong preference for films that evoke humor and depth, frequently praising the comedic duo's performances for their chemistry and ability to deliver engaging stories. There is a recurring appreciation for exceptional scripts and production quality, particularly in films that feature significant social commentary or explore profound themes of human connection and culture. The user values powerful acting and thoughtful narrative, often recommending these films to others, indicating a consistent satisfaction with cinematic experiences that blend entertainment with meaningful messages.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user expresses disappointment primarily regarding films perceived as pretentious or overly complex, as indicated by negative reactions to narratives that do not meet expectations of depth. A specific film was critiqued for its confusing and frustrating storytelling, contrasting sharply with the user’s admiration for clarity and significance in cinema. There is also a dissatisfaction with viewing experiences that lack available subtitles or significant content advisories, which may detract from overall enjoyment. This reflects a desire for accessible content and straightforward narratives.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping behavior indicates a strong inclination towards high-quality films, especially those with humor and insightful commentary, resulting in consistently high ratings for most purchases. Positive reviews highlight a preference for engaging storytelling and strong performances, particularly in comedies and dramas that resonate on a personal level. However, they have had notable negative experiences with complex narratives that fail to deliver meaning, suggesting that clarity and relevance are crucial to their viewing expectations. Overall, the user demonstrates a discerning taste in cinema, balancing enjoyment with a need for substance.

target_interaction.title: Great story
target_interaction.text: Clint Eastwood just keeps getting better. The story is tight, relevent, and plausible. The acting is fantastic from the entire cast.
